titleStmt.title: A declaration made by King James, in Scotland; concerning, church-government, and presbyters.
Declaratioun of the Kings Majesties intentioun and meaning toward the lait actis of Parliament. English and Scots.
titleStmt.author: Adamson, Patrick, 1537-1592.
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: Now printed, in English and Scotch; for Matthew Walbancke, at Grays-Inne gate,

notesStmt.note: Written by Patrick Adamson for James I.
Originally published in Scots in 1585 as: A declaratioun of the Kings Majesties intentioun and meaning toward the lait actis of Parliament.

"A declaratioun of the Kings Majesties intentioun and meaning toward the lait actis of Parliament", the original Scots text, has separate title page with arms of Charles I and imprint "Imprinted at Edinburgh, by Thomas Vautroullier. 1585."; pagination and register are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
